argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mp2.1 | |- ph |
| 2 |  | mp2.2 | |- ps |
| 3 |  | mp2.3 | |- ( ph -> ( ps -> ch ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_mpi | |- ( ph -> ch ) |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_ax-mp | |- ch |
\
 Obsolete proof of ~ mp2 as of 21-Jul-2019.  Shorter proof, but uses two more axioms.  (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 23-Jul-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
